arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs. Napoli: another big showdown
arts.sum: There have been 84 official meetings between the two clubs in Florence: 39 Fiorentina wins, 24 draws, and 21 Napoli victories. Napoli ended the 2024/25 Serie A season and have begun 2025/26 on a 14-match unbeaten run (nine wins and five draws).
